attributes.action: Cease government spending on additional, or replacement nuclear weaponry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whether nuclear weaponry is morally right or not, we believe that the United Kingdom already has enough in the way of nuclear weaponry to act as a deterrent to hostile nations and that money spent on additional nuclear weaponry could be better spent elsewhere.  For example - but not limited to - the National Health Service.
